basics.name: Mourad Khayati
basics.title: Senior Lecturer
basics.summary: A Swiss/Tunisian (french-born) researcher working on various data engineering problems including time series cleaning, management, storage, and visualization.

work.name: Department of Computer Science, University of Fribourg
work.summary: Teaching at University of Fribourg, while doing research on time series cleaning, data imputation, and time series database systems.

work.name: Department of Computer Science, University of Fribourg
work.summary: Teaching at University of Fribourg, while doing research on time series cleaning, data imputation, and time series database systems.

awards.title: Outstanding PC Award
awards.awarder: ACM SIGKDD International Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining

projects.name: FashionBrain: Understanding Europe’s Fashion Data Universe
projects.summary: The FashionBrain project is a €2.8m three year project funded by the European Commission’s Horizon 2020 programme.

projects.name: ProvDS: Uncertain Provenance Management over Incomplete Linked Data Streams
projects.summary: The ProvDB project investigates methods to compute provenance over Linked Data Streams that are incomplete. More specifically, it proposes provenance and recovery-aware data management techniques that take as input incomplete streams, and simultaneously recover the missing data and compute the provenance over the reconstructed streams.
